subject: Re: [junit] How to set the order in Junit
msgSnippet: Hi, If you re asking about the ordering of tests, it s discouraged in JUnit. For more information, see this stackoverflow Answer:
messageBody:
Hi,

If you're asking about the ordering of tests, it's discouraged in JUnit.
For more information, see this stackoverflow Answer:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/7845929/has-junit4-begun-supporting-ordering-of-test-is-it-intentional/7846712#7846712


Matthew Farwell.
